specialRules.hint: The hero and up to half of your army get the Ambush special rule (must deploy within 3” of the hero).
specialRules.name: Darkness-Protocol
specialRules.label: Darkness-Protocol
specialRules.description: The hero and up to half of your army get the Ambush special rule (must deploy within 3” of the hero).

specialRules.hint: For each unmodified result of 6 you roll to hit that hit is multiplied by 4.
specialRules.name: Flux
specialRules.label: Flux
specialRules.description: For each unmodified result of 6 you roll to hit that hit is multiplied by 4.

specialRules.hint: This model may block spells as if it had the Psychic(2) special rule. If it is a Psychic then it gets +2 to spell block rolls.
specialRules.name: Gloom-Protocol
specialRules.label: Gloom-Protocol
specialRules.description: This model may block spells as if it had the Psychic(2) special rule. If it is a Psychic then it gets +2 to spell block rolls.

specialRules.hint: On a round in which this unit arrives from Ambush it gets AP(+3).
specialRules.name: Hunter
specialRules.label: Hunter
specialRules.description: On a round in which this unit arrives from Ambush it gets AP(+3).

specialRules.hint: The hero and all friendly units within 12” may ignore wounds from Regeneration on 4+.
specialRules.name: Regen-Protocol
specialRules.label: Regen-Protocol
specialRules.description: The hero and all friendly units within 12” may ignore wounds from Regeneration on 4+.

specialRules.hint: The hero and all friendly units within 12” may ignore the Slow special rule.
specialRules.name: Royal March
specialRules.label: Royal March
specialRules.description: The hero and all friendly units within 12” may ignore the Slow special rule.

specialRules.hint: Enemies get -1 to hit when they attack units where all models have this rule.
specialRules.name: Shield Wall
specialRules.label: Shield Wall
specialRules.description: Enemies get -1 to hit when they attack units where all models have this rule.

spells.name: Star Bots
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” gets -1 to melee next time it fights.

spells.name: Meteor Bots
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 2 automatic hits with AP(2).

spells.name: Assault Bots
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” may immediately move by up to 3”.

spells.name: Thunderbolt Bots
spells.effect: Target enemy model within 12” takes 4 automatic hits.

spells.name: Arrow Bots
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 18” gets -2 to hit next time it shoots.

spells.name: Fire Bots
spells.effect: Target 2 enemy units within 6” take 6 automatic hits with AP(1) each.
